mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject,status,create_time,update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, e.name AS master_name FROM clazz c INNER JOIN emp e ON c.master_id = e.id and c.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select c.*,e.name master_name from clazz c,emp e where c.id = #{id} and e.id= c.master_id;
